programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les rollers de Danny / La surprise de Ryder) S7 (14/26)
programme.desc: «Les rollers de Danny / La surprise de Ryder»A mix-up delivery leads to Ms. Marjorie and Danny speeding out of control in Adventure Bay. Now the Pups must rescue them. // Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped in a Jungle Gym. It's up to the Pups to save them.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (De drôles de nuages / La ruée vers la comète de cristal) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «De drôles de nuages / La ruée vers la comète de cristal»Bobbi wants to spend time with Jade, but there are candy floss clouds to worry about first! // Can Jade and the Deer Squad help the crystal comet release its rainbow colours? Only if Jade learns to trust her friends.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Rainbow Comet Rush) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Rainbow Comet Rush»Can Jade and the Deer Squad help the crystal comet release its rainbow colours? Only if Jade learns to trust her friends.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work) S2 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work»Judy loses a tooth quite literally- Will it be found in time for bed and will the tooth fairy like marmalade? // Paddington becomes a work bear and helps Mr. Brown in the home office but learns computers can be tricky things.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News) S2 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News»The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they? // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need a front page story!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa fait de l'exercice) S1 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Papa fait de l'exercice»Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le rangement) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Le rangement»Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'aire de jeu) S1 (44/52)
programme.desc: «L'aire de jeu»Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa's friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide because it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa accroche une photo) S1 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Papa accroche une photo»Papa Pig promises to put up a picture of Peppa and George when Mama Pig is gone. He accidentally damages the wall, so Peppa and George help Papa Pig fix the wall before Mama Pig gets home.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Couac dans la Vallée de l'Harmonie) S6 (n°32)
programme.desc: «Couac dans la Vallée de l'Harmonie»Everyone in the Old West town of Harmony Valley loves playing music together. But when noisy Billy Joe Strumlouder rides into town to sabotage their tunes, Sheriff Zooli must save the day--with music!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La fête des lumières avec Blue) S3 (n°6)
programme.desc: «La fête des lumières avec Blue»Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah, the festival of lights! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special, surprise guest coming to our Hanukkah party, and we'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue s'amuse dans la neige) S3 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Blue s'amuse dans la neige»There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Les bateaux ont été rétrécis / Le défilé des pirates) S1 (11/21)
programme.desc: «Les bateaux ont été rétrécis / Le défilé des pirates»When Escarlata turns the crew tiny, they have to find a pint-sized way to save the day. // It's time for the annual Pirate Parade! That is, unless Escarlata has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Lost Girl in a Canoe) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «The Lost Girl in a Canoe»The crew meet a Chamorro girl with a broken canoe who has been magically transported to their ocean.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Rainy Day Roundup) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Rainy Day Roundup»When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires»When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Freeze Pops) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Freeze Pops»Tiny Chef makes ice pops but can't wait for them to freeze! He learns that patience is an important part of cooking.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La fête de Jake / La Pat'Patrouille sauve la maison de Marjorie) S5 (21/26)
programme.desc: «La fête de Jake / La Pat'Patrouille sauve la maison de Marjorie»Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le joueur mystère) S2 (3/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le joueur mystère»Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. How will he get it back?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camping) S1 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Le camping»Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La princesse fatiguée) S1 (36/52)
programme.desc: «La princesse fatiguée»Papa Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a sleepy princess. In the story Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mama Pig is the queen and Papa Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La cabane dans l'arbre) S1 (37/52)
programme.desc: «La cabane dans l'arbre»Peppa and George visit Grandma Pig and Grandpa Pig. Grandpa Pig built them a tree house.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Backwards Day) S1 (n°61)
programme.desc: «Backwards Day»Anna and Froga forgot that today is Ron's Day. There's nothing to eat and Christopher is missing! But, in the rush, everything is going wrong. How will they ever manage to throw a great party for Ron?

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Stuck) S1 (n°62)
programme.desc: «Stuck»Froga has made Christopher a homemade helmet in watermelon, with ear holes for his stuffed animal Geegee - but when Froga hand gets stuck inside one of the holes, it's an adventure trying to release her.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La photo-souvenir de Gingembre et Sauge) S3 (n°13)
programme.desc: «La photo-souvenir de Gingembre et Sauge»Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are trying to take a photo of Sage and Ginger for their baby book, but they just can't seem to make the twins smile. We'll play a silly game of Blue's Clues to figure out how to make the twins giggle!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La tulipe poule / Le requin cascadeur) S8 (12/24)
programme.desc: «La tulipe poule / Le requin cascadeur»When Mayor Humdinger and his mother help Mayor Goodway look for a rare tulip, Humdinger's attempts to have his mom find the flower first gets them all in trouble. // The Pups must save Daring Danny X when a mechanical shark stunt that goes awry.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Tooth Fairy) S9 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Tooth Fairy»Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Les Super Clones / Mise en boîte»In order to win the Citizen of the Year, Sir Steel and Professor Scratch create holograms doubles of Deer Squad who cause chaos all around. // It's Recycling Day and Sir Steel puts the whole town in cardboard boxes with his Box-ooka device.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Muffin dans l'espace / Une limonade qui secoue) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Muffin dans l'espace / Une limonade qui secoue»Sir Steel catapults all his old junk into space - but suddenly realises Muffin is in there too! He needs Deer Squad's help to bring her home. // Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave) S2 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave»Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Freeze Pops) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Freeze Pops»Tiny Chef makes ice pops but can't wait for them to freeze! He learns that patience is an important part of cooking.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Greedyguts / Where is Bali?) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Greedyguts / Where is Bali?»Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...»Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Ma petite dent / La bestiole baveuse) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Ma petite dent / La bestiole baveuse»When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Busy Baby) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Busy Baby»Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Echange de rôles) S1 (63/78)
programme.desc: «Echange de rôles»When Froga and Anna realize they have switched mugs in the morning, they decide to make a day out of it and Switcheroo Day is born. Reversing roles, Froga will prepare lunch while Anna tends to Froga's strawberry plants.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Missing Socks) S1 (n°64)
programme.desc: «The Missing Socks»When Froga realizes her socks are smelly after a day of gardening, Bubu offers to help by placing them into his SMELL BETTER MACHINE. When the machine ends one of Froga's beloved socks has disappeared. She's worried it's gone forever.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Giant Strawberry) S1 (n°75)
programme.desc: «The Giant Strawberry»When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubble Trouble) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Bubble Trouble»Bubu's bubble maker invention works so well, it creates an enormous bubble that Christopher gets trapped in! He loves his journey soaring over the land - but his friends are desperate to rescue him!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Party Time) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Party Time»Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name... Anna finds the perfect name: Friendship party!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Prank Day) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Prank Day»Today is Prank day, Anna and her friends must compete to elect the best prankster of all. Everyone's doing a great except Christopher. The friends are surprised when the worst prankster turns out to be the best!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le concours de déguisements) S1 (38/52)
programme.desc: «Le concours de déguisements»Peppa and George have a party where everyone comes dressed up. Peppa is an elf princess and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to choose which of her friends is dressed up the best.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 (n°39)
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une chaude journée) S1 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Une chaude journée»It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les marionnettes de Chloé) S1 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Les marionnettes de Chloé»Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Bac à Sable) S4 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le Bac à Sable»Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Animaux de nuit) S4 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Animaux de nuit»It's night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, and Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le club secret) S3 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le club secret»Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club - going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Double Dare You) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Double Dare You»On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe»Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le circuit du Taureau Furieux) S3 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Le circuit du Taureau Furieux»Blaze and Starla discover a map that leads to The Leaping Bull Race Track. They search together and cross the Wild West.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (L'équipe de Truckball) S1 (10/20)
programme.desc: «L'équipe de Truckball»"Blaze discovers an exciting new sport called Truckball. But when Crusher and his team of cronies challenge him, Blaze must scour all of Axle City to put together a Truckball team before the big game.".

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Galinetta et Roucoco / La leçon de snowboard) S8 (1/26)
programme.desc: «Galinetta et Roucoco / La leçon de snowboard»Chickaletta and Roosterio run away from a chicken show and get stuck on top of a runaway drone. // When Bettina wanders up Jake's mountain and gets caught in a snowstorm, it's up to the Paw Patrol to bring her safely down.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les rollers de Danny / La surprise de Ryder) S7 (14/26)
programme.desc: «Les rollers de Danny / La surprise de Ryder»A mix-up delivery leads to Ms. Marjorie and Danny speeding out of control in Adventure Bay. Now the Pups must rescue them. // Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped in a Jungle Gym. It's up to the Pups to save them.

programme.desc: «Rainbow Comet Rush»Can Jade and the Deer Squad help the crystal comet release its rainbow colours? Only if Jade learns to trust her friends.

programme.desc: «Le rangement»Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.desc: «The Lost Girl in a Canoe»The crew meet a Chamorro girl with a broken canoe who has been magically transported to their ocean.

programme.desc: «Rainy Day Roundup»When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires»When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Freeze Pops) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Freeze Pops»Tiny Chef makes ice pops but can't wait for them to freeze! He learns that patience is an important part of cooking.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La fête de Jake / La Pat'Patrouille sauve la maison de Marjorie) S5 (21/26)
programme.desc: «La fête de Jake / La Pat'Patrouille sauve la maison de Marjorie»Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le joueur mystère) S2 (3/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le joueur mystère»Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. How will he get it back?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (A la plage) S1 (46/52)
programme.desc: «A la plage»Peppa and her family go to the beach. There they do all kinds of things, such as digging Papa Pig in the sand. When it's time to go home, they almost leave without Papa Big, because he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Madame Patte géante) S1 (47/52)
programme.desc: «Madame Patte géante»George finds a spider in the bathroom sink. Peppa is very scared until she realizes he doesn't want to harm her.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le bateau de papi) S1 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le bateau de papi»Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Une rencontre mystérieuse) S1 (65/78)
programme.desc: «Une rencontre mystérieuse»Bubu is eager to meet a real space alien so he builds a homemade antenna and sound box to communicate with outer space. He is amazed when he and Ron discover two glowing eyes. It must be the space alien!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Squeaky Boots) S1 (n°66)
programme.desc: «The Squeaky Boots»Christopher leads the friends in a fun game of HIDE AND SEEK. But Froga soon realizes that her new boots are letting out a noisy SQEEEAK. When a pesky mosquito enters the picture and threatens to ruin the winning prize!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Into the Blueniverse) S3 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Into the Blueniverse»It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon) S8 (13/24)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon»Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Les Nuages de couleur / La grande course»Sir Steel is upset with Lola's sky art as it affects the popularity of his hat stand, so he tries to disperse her artwork. // The Deer Squad have a race to see whose cart is the fastest, but Sir Steel unexpectedly join in with his Steelmobile!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Perruque en fuite / Ça tourne !) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Perruque en fuite / Ça tourne !»When Sir Steel's high-tech wig malfunctions and goes on the rampage in Platinum City the Deer Squad race to the rescue. // The Deer Squad must think fast to save Lady Fluffpot when Sir Steel's filming turns into a Disaster Movie!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy) S2 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy»Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! Judy & Toq also find a treasure map, but who will find the treasure first? // Mr. Gruber has always wanted to go to Italy & Paddington sets about helping his friend achieve his dream!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Lemonade) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Lemonade»Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve la Limande / La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve un narval) S4 (22/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve la Limande / La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve un narval»Cap'n Turbot's boat gets frozen in the Arctic Ice. // The pups use the Sea Patroller to help guide a lost narwhal back home.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat'Patrouille des mers : Le volcan sous-marin / La Pat'Patrouille des mers : Inondation à la ferme) S5 (6/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat'Patrouille des mers : Le volcan sous-marin / La Pat'Patrouille des mers : Inondation à la ferme»Francois and Turbot discover an underwater volcano is going to erupt while Farmer Yumi and Mayor Goodway are unknowingly scuba diving nearby. This is a mission for the Sea Patrol! // Farmer Al's farm is flooded! The PAW Patrol needs to rescue him.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve mamie Tilly / Un éléphant en colère) S5 (13/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve mamie Tilly / Un éléphant en colère»The Paw Patrol must rescue Cap'n Turbot and Francois' Grandma Tilly after she rides off on a Dolphin. // Carlos and Tracker calls the Paw Patrol to help solve the mystery of a rumbling sound that's upsetting the Jungle elephants.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (L'île des tortues / Volcan en éruption !) S8 (6/26)
programme.desc: «L'île des tortues / Volcan en éruption !»Mayor Humdinger swipes Francois' water-walking shoes and ends up trapped in a pit-like turtle nest. // A long lost letter inspires Ms. Marjorie to visit an old surfing buddy. The pups spring into action when a nearby volcano erupts.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Sea Patrol 3 - Pups Save a Shark) S4 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Sea Patrol 3 - Pups Save a Shark»In hopes to have the whole beach to himself - Humdinger makes a robotic shark to scare everyone away.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle) S9 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle»When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La pièce de théâtre) S1 (52/52)
programme.desc: «La pièce de théâtre»Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vacances de Polly) S2 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Les vacances de Polly»Granny and Grandpa's pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le vent d'automne) S2 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Le vent d'automne»It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppa's ball blows into the pond and George's hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mystères) S2 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Mystères»Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are watching their favourite television programme: "Detective Potato". Peppa and George want to be famous detectives too. So, Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George try to find him. Using a magnifying glass, Peppa and George follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit) S3 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit»Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Secouer, racler, taper) S3 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Secouer, racler, taper»Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa Pig, champion du monde) S4 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Papa Pig, champion du monde»Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (When I Grow Up) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «When I Grow Up»A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Dépanner c'est un métier) S3 (8/20)
programme.desc: «Dépanner c'est un métier»Blaze transforms into a tow-truck - and, with the help of AJ and Gabby, sets off on a tow-tally awesome adventure to save Stripes.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Gâteau-strophe !) S1 (11/20)
programme.desc: «Gâteau-strophe !»"When a hungry Crusher accidentally turns the baker truck's baker bots to messy mode, they sprout wheels and drive away! It's up to AJ and Blaze to track down all the rampaging robots before Axle City is blanketed in baked goods.".
